title: Oh Rito, you so punny
body:
I know I'm awfully late with this one, but did anyone notice that in chapter 2 of [Shadow and Fortune](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/shadow-and-fortune/chapter-2.html) MF said she dipped her bullets in Myrons Dark? As in the drink Myrons Dark Rum, mentioned in the seventh [Jornal of Justice](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/The_Journal_of_Justice:_Volume_1,_Issue_07#Raise_Your_Glass!)? And that she also said they'd have some _spirits_ of their own to meet the ghosts with?

 Old and specific lore pun is old and specific.

replies.body:
I bet they're happy someone caught that ;)  

I know whenever I've worked on something (note, I'm not on the Narrative team just now), sneaking in some super specific nods to the most knowledgeable of the audience is crazy-satisfying!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jHt1qjmV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-17T17:54:23.434+0000)
>
> I bet they're happy someone caught that ;)  
> 
> I know whenever I've worked on something (note, I'm not on the Narrative team just now), sneaking in some super specific nods to the most knowledgeable of the audience is crazy-satisfying!

Sometimes I still tink about events in the JoJ, but I've got nowhere near that detailed of a memory. Nice work, Shade.
Yea i noticed that but people don't usually read the lore so so many are missing out. I'm glad i didn't. :)
Well I didn't remember the specific issue, but I did notice they mentioned a brand of spirit that was mentioned during the JoJ Era.
